channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description:
Tonight. https://t.co/PzEhVRHxBO
The evening went by fast. I accidentally bid $110 for an item when I meant $10 (everybody was OK with the correction, but it did cause a stir). I couldn’t sneak away to the bar as often as I wanted. I did what I could and drank two shots of Brennivín instead of the offered one.
Goodbye, Swish Chalet that I’ve been to only once, with the woman I had just started seeing at the time. https://t.co/VZsD38q6k1
I got these flowers for my apartment. They’re pretty, but they’re not as pretty as you. https://t.co/eOfZD0PeUE
Anybody want to join me in trying to visit all 9+ sites of @TorontoBiennial in one day?

If there’s anything I love more than exoplanets, it’s visualizing exoplanets, and if there’s anything I love more than visualizing exoplanets, it’s representing exoplanets as musical notes. https://t.co/HT4LhYVs4J
@Kimli Oh good, I was hoping you’d like it.
Since I can’t read without my glasses, I too have shampoo-blindness. https://t.co/B4O9uRrweR

Remember the time I posted a “Lost Watch” poster on the city streets of Toronto, hoping someone would find it and return it to me? This is what it looked like (with tabs that had my phone number and an email address at the bottom). https://t.co/jp3mgqczxr https://t.co/kozcj3DW8a
It’s looking a lot like I’ll be in British Columbia for a joyous occasion in the middle of June. Dates TBD, dependent on something that will happen in Ontario on one of two Sundays that month.
@dailysimpsons “Oh, no. No pal of mine is going to stay in some dingy flophouse.”
@dailysimpsons https://t.co/rx6RBb6eOv
I don’t know how to relax.

It’s going ahead, though the way I phrased it at @CanadaPlanner, it could have been interpreted to mean His Holiness was coming to Canada. (Something I might have believed for a while.) When I wrote it, I consulted this guide, which explains my phrasing. https://t.co/t22HowUZh5
The Winnipeg Free Press has a section for its coverage of Pope Francis visiting Indigenous delegates travelling to the Vatican from Canada. https://t.co/Syn7hG5mlw
@dailysimpsons @_rich_moore @jon_vitti @canyonjim @simonsam “Oh, no. No pal of mine is going to stay in some dingy flophouse.”

Life is good if you can eat a hot dog and fries while sitting at an outdoor chess board in the middle of Toronto. https://t.co/T5zFCMQkHD
/cc @Kimli
The last time I tried to bid on Icelandic candy, Estonian ladies that drank me under the table that night outbid me, and then gave me some of it. https://t.co/Ech41CGBM8

Dual-screening sports is exhausting, but it isn’t as exhausting as quad-screening sports. https://t.co/qqCeHlAAXl https://t.co/MCKiAw2RRu
One of my teams won, and it’s not over for the other one.

@gaminginthewild For problems like this (too many good things to choose from, too little time), I put things in a list and let a random picker make the choice for me. It was my attempt to combat decision fatigue, plus remove regret from the equation.

I bought this since I’d be sitting in that level anyway, and going alone anyway, and my seat is randomly assigned, which I can get behind because it means I don’t have to decide on where to sit (I hate deciding anything). https://t.co/S3d5YSJe0m
I won’t be going to all 11 games. More like 4 of them. But I’ll get a foot-long hot dog at each of them.
@PortmanDoe I wish there was a gesture for “You’ve had two years to figure this out” that’s subtle enough for that person to not come over and punch me in the face, but I don’t think there is.

Is your name also Richard? Then join my Twitter Community! We can talk about how great the name Richard is, and what makes a Good Richard and what makes a Bad Richard, and endlessly debate which historical and contemporary Richard is which. https://t.co/YrDuzHM5La
Do you live in Toronto and have a balcony? Let’s talk about it! Join the #BalconyTO Twitter Community! https://t.co/CeaY3WoAXZ
Do you live in Toronto and have a balcony? Let’s talk about it! Join the #BalconyTO Twitter Community! https://t.co/6UMbKMe7qs
New Röyksopp track, yessssssss. https://t.co/H6LlHRAOr4
I’ve been looking forward to this feature for some time. https://t.co/KELdjR9aCn
